title: Allergen & ID Compliance at a Street Festival Bar
system_mod: Provide an at-a-glance compliance kit: ID flow, allergy labeling, incident log, and escalation tree. Include signage language and a 5-step pre-shift brief.
venue_context: Outdoor street festival pop-up (1,200 guests, 4-hour window), limited shade, mixed staff from two venues, simple batched menu.
prompt: We need bulletproof ID checks and clear allergen labeling for two batched cocktails (one contains almond orgeat). Give us the exact setup, roles, scripts, and signage.
